name: Reproduction Man
description: Reproduction Man is a 2D puzzler where you help some very simple-minded sperm get to the egg. This cult classic of the Windows shareware era was brought back for its 20th anniversary with all-new graphics, animation and sound. Its outward cuteness belies some very tough puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon(TM) 9500 or better, NVIDIA GeForce(TM) FX 5900 or better, Intel GMA 950 or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 70 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon(TM) 9500 or better, NVIDIA GeForce(TM) FX 5900 or better, Intel GMA 950 or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 70 MB available space
